data.name: customSqlQuery1.Sql
data.value:
SELECT HR.EmpCode,dbo.getDateKH(HR.ResigneDate) as ResigneDate ,HR.Reason,SP.OthAllName CreateBy,HR.Department,HR.Section,HR.Position,HD.SecDescription as KhDept,HP.SecDescription as KhPost, HS.SecDescription as KHSECT,HR.DocumentNo as RefNo,CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), YEAR(CONVERT(DATE, HR.CreatedOn))) AS YearResign,dbo.getDateKH(HR.CreatedOn) CreatedOn, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Sex FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=HR.EmpCode)Sex, (SELECT TOP 1 dbo.getDateKH(M.StartDate) FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=HR.EmpCode)StartDate, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode=HR.EmpCode)OthAllName,
(SELECT TOP 1 Images FROM HRCompany WHERE SP.CompanyCode=HRCompany.Company)as Logo,SP.Signature, dbo.getDateKH(GETDATE()) DateNow, (SELECT TOP 1 StampRejectImage FROM SYHRSetting)RejectImage, (CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(EX.Approver) FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel in(@APROLEVEL+1))>0THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)N_A, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END))Status1, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END))Status2, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END))Status3, (SELECT TOP 1 EX.Status FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END))Status4,
dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate1, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate2, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate3, dbo.getDateKH((SELECT TOP 1 EX.ApprovedDate FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))ApprovedDate4,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName3, (SELECT TOP 1 M.OthAllName FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))ApproverName4,
(SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(1,2,3,4) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)))sign1, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(2,3,4) THEN 2 ELSE 0 END)))sign2, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(3,4) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END)))sign3, (SELECT TOP 1 M.Signature FROM HRStaffProfile M WHERE M.EmpCode IN(SELECT TOP 1 EX.Approver FROM ExDocApproval EX WHERE EX.DocumentNo=HR.DocumentNo AND EX.DocumentType=HR.DocType AND Ex.ApproveLevel IN(CASE WHEN @APROLEVEL in(4) THEN 4 ELSE 0 END)))sign4 FROM HREFEmpResign HR LEFT JOIN HRStaffProfile SP ON SP.EmpCode = HR.CreatedBy LEFT JOIN HRDepartment HD ON HD.Code = HR.Department LEFT JOIN HRSection HS ON HS.Code = HR.Section LEFT JOIN HRPosition HP ON HP.Code = HR.Position left join HRCompany COM on SP.CompanyCode=COM.Company WHERE HR.ResignType = 'RESIGN' AND HR.DocumentNo= @DocumentNo;
